Hi.

A lot of battle paintings of the sengoku period show samurai units usi=
ng weapons other 
than swords as their primary weapon. I think that you are=
 thinking more of the Edo period 
where male members of the buke class cust=
omarily wore two swords when out doors, but 
did not generally carry other =
weapons.
